title: Don't Forget Me
description: I have been hiding for most of my life, the last thing on my mind was love.But how could I deny myself when the person I had been craving so sweetly handed herself over to me on a silver platter?I planned to lay low at Club Pétale, maybe have a bit of fun while I was at it, but after meeting her my plans changed.Now I will stop at nothing until she is mine, even if that meant going back to school.I’ll see you soon, Professor Evens.I hope you haven’t forgotten about me just yet.
author: Eden    Emory
